pages.text: A rune associated with oblivion and absence.
$(l)In World$()$(br)$(li)Wield: Voids contents of attached inventory$(li)Self: WIP - voids item entities$(li)Collision: WIP - Curses
$(l)On Armor$()$(br)$(li)Wield: Consumes negative effects$(li)Self: True invisibility (configurable)$(li)Collision: Weapons inflict void damage
